mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION ( NO , WRITER , CATE_NO , TITLE , CONTENT , ENROLL_DATE , DELETE_YN , MODIFY_DATE , HIT ) VALUES ( SEQ_KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION_NO.NEXTVAL , #{writer} , #{cateNo} , #{title} , #{content} , SYSDATE , 'N' , SYSDATE , '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT K.NO, C.NAME AS CATE_NO, K.TITLE, TO_CHAR(K.CONTENT) CONTENT, M.NICK AS WRITER, K.HIT, TO_CHAR(CAST(K.ENROLL_DATE as DATE),'YYYY.MM.DD') ENROLL_DATE, M.IMG_PATH, NVL(REPLY_CNT,0) REPLY_CNT, NVL(LIKES,0) LIKES FROM KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION K JOIN MEMBER M ON K.WRITER = M.NO JOIN KNOWLEDGE_CATEGORY C ON K.CATE_NO = C.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT Q_NO, COUNT(*) REPLY_CNT FROM KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND DEPTH = '0' GROUP BY Q_NO) A ON K.NO = A.Q_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKES FROM KNOWLEDGE_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY NO) L ON K.NO = L.NO WHERE K.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND C.NAME = #{type} AND (K.TITLE LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR K.CONTENT LIKE '%${keyword}%') ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC ORDER BY K.HIT DESC ORDER BY REPLY_CNT DESC ORDER BY LIKES DESC

SELECT K.NO, K.TITLE, C.NAME AS CATE_NO, TO_CHAR(K.CONTENT) CONTENT, M.NICK AS WRITER, M.IMG_PATH, TO_CHAR(CAST(K.ENROLL_DATE as DATE),'YYYY.MM.DD')ENROLL_DATE, K.HIT, NVL(SCRAP_CNT,0) SCRAP_CNT, NVL(LIKES,0) LIKES, NVL(HATES,0) HATES, NVL(REPLY_CNT,0) REPLY_CNT FROM KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION K JOIN MEMBER M ON K.WRITER = M.NO JOIN KNOWLEDGE_CATEGORY C ON K.CATE_NO = C.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT Q_NO, COUNT(*) SCRAP_CNT FROM KNOWLEDGE_SCRAP GROUP BY Q_NO) S ON K.NO = S.Q_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT Q_NO, COUNT(*) REPLY_CNT FROM KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND DEPTH = '0' GROUP BY Q_NO) A ON K.NO = A.Q_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKES, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HATES FROM KNOWLEDGE_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY NO) L ON K.NO = L.NO WHERE K.NO = #{qno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER VALUES (SEQ_KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{qno}, #{mno}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N', SYSDATE, 'N', '0', SEQ_KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_NO.NEXTVAL) VALUES (SEQ_KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER_NO.NEXTVAL, #{qno}, #{mno}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N', SYSDATE, 'N', '1', #{group})
mapper.select: SELECT A."GROUP", M.NICK AS WRITER, A.NO, A.Q_NO, TO_CHAR(A.CONTENT) CONTENT, A.SELECT_YN, TO_CHAR(CAST(A.ENROLL_DATE as DATE),'YYYY.MM.DD')ENROLL_DATE, NVL(LIKES,0) LIKES, NVL(HATES,0) HATES FROM KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER A JOIN KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION Q ON A.Q_NO = Q.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON A.WRITER = M.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT A_NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKES, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HATES FROM K_CMT_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY A_NO) L ON A.NO = L.A_NO WHERE A.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND A.DEPTH = '0' AND A.Q_NO = #{qno} ORDER BY A.NO

SELECT M.IMG_PATH, M.NICK AS WRITER, A.NO, A.Q_NO, TO_CHAR(A.CONTENT) CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CAST(A.ENROLL_DATE as DATE),'YYYY.MM.DD')ENROLL_DATE, NVL(LIKES,0) LIKES, NVL(HATES,0) HATES, A."GROUP" FROM KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER A JOIN KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION Q ON A.Q_NO = Q.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON A.WRITER = M.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT A_NO, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'L' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS LIKES, SUM(CASE WHEN STATUS = 'H' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS HATES FROM K_CMT_LIKE_HATE GROUP BY A_NO) L ON A.NO = L.A_NO WHERE A.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND A.DEPTH = '1' AND A."GROUP" = #{agno} ORDER BY A.NO
mapper.update: UPDATE KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER SET SELECT_YN = 'Y' WHERE NO = #{no} AND DEPTH = '0'
mapper.select: SELECT K.NO, C.NAME AS CATE_NO, K.TITLE, TO_CHAR(K.CONTENT) CONTENT, M.NICK AS WRITER, K.HIT, TO_CHAR(CAST(K.ENROLL_DATE as DATE),'YYYY.MM.DD') ENROLL_DATE, M.IMG_PATH, NVL(REPLY_CNT,0) REPLY_CNT FROM KNOWLEDGE_QUESTION K JOIN MEMBER M ON K.WRITER = M.NO JOIN KNOWLEDGE_CATEGORY C ON K.CATE_NO = C.NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT Q_NO, COUNT(*) REPLY_CNT FROM KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER WHERE DELETE_YN = 'N' AND DEPTH = '0' GROUP BY Q_NO) A ON K.NO = A.Q_NO WHERE K.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND K.WRITER = #{no} ORDER BY K.NO DESC
SELECT M.IMG_PATH, M.NICK, COUNT(K.NO) CNT FROM KNOWLEDGE_ANSWER K JOIN MEMBER M ON K.WRITER = M.NO WHERE K.SELECT_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY (M.NICK, M.IMG_PATH) ORDER BY CNT DESC FETCH NEXT 7 ROWS ONLY
